item.title: Powell blasts DOJ criminal probe as attack on Fed independence. ‘Public service sometimes requires standing firm in the face of threats’
item.description: He said in a statement Sunday that the Justice Department served the Fed with grand jury subpoenas, threatening a criminal indictment.

item.title: What global executives need to ask about China in 2026
item.description: China presents new challenges—particularly from confident local competitors—but the country still presents offers for disciplined executives.

item.title: Buddhist monks are walking barefoot from Texas to D.C. with their dog, drawing big crowds across the South
item.description: Beyond promoting peace, their highest priority is connecting with people along the way.
